statements: SELECT * FROM volunteer_shifts;
SELECT volunteer_id, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_shifts;
SELECT event_id, shift_date FROM volunteer_shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE event_id = 3 ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE volunteer_id = 5 AND shift_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_date, start_time;
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(*) AS shifts_count FROM volunteer_shifts GROUP BY volunteer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT event_id FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT shift_id, volunteer_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE volunteer_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY volunteer_id, shift_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT volunteer_id, shift_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE location = 'Main Hall' ORDER BY volunteer_id ASC;
SELECT id, shift_date, shift_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE shift_time BETWEEN '10:00' AND '14:00';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT volunteer_id, shift_date FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE volunteer_id = 100 ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE location = 'City Park';
SELECT shift_date, shift_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE volunteer_id = 5 ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT shift_time FROM volunteer_shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM volunteer_shifts GROUP BY volunteer_id HAVING total_shifts >= 3;
SELECT vs.volunteer_id, es.event_id FROM volunteer_shifts vs INNER JOIN event_schedules es ON vs.shift_date = es.shift_date AND vs.shift_time = es.shift_time WHERE vs.location = 'Main Street';
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM shifts GROUP BY event_id, event_name;
SELECT shift_id, shift_date, shift_time FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT event_name FROM events WHERE event_date > '2021-09-01' AND event_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM shifts WHERE event_id = 456 AND shift_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT event_name, shift_date, shift_time FROM events JOIN shifts ON events.event_id = shifts.event_id WHERE events.event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, event_name FROM volunteers JOIN shifts ON volunteers.volunteer_id = shifts.volunteer_id JOIN events ON shifts.event_id = events.event_id WHERE events.event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shift WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT event_name, date, location FROM event WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM volunteer WHERE id = 3;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time, location FROM event ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT volunteer.name, shift.location FROM schedule JOIN volunteer ON schedule.volunteer_id = volunteer.id JOIN shift ON schedule.shift_id = shift.shift_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteer;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT event_name, date, location FROM event WHERE date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT v.name, s.date, s.start_time, e.event_name FROM volunteer v INNER JOIN schedule sch ON v.id = sch.volunteer_id INNER JOIN shift s ON sch.shift_id = s.shift_id INNER JOIN event e ON sch.event_id = e.event_id;
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM event ORDER BY date DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_location LIKE 'City%';
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers;
SELECT * FROM Shifts WHERE shift_date >= '2023-06-01' ORDER BY shift_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_name LIKE '%John%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Shifts WHERE shift_date > '2022-01-01' AND shift_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shift_start_time, shift_end_time;

SELECT event_name, volunteer_name, category_name FROM Events JOIN Shifts ON Events.event_id = Shifts.event_id JOIN ShiftAssignments ON Shifts.shift_id = ShiftAssignments.shift_id JOIN Volunteers ON ShiftAssignments.volunteer_id = Volunteers.volunteer_id JOIN ShiftCategories ON ShiftAssignments.category_id = ShiftCategories.category_id;

SELECT shift_id, event_name, volunteer_name, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM Shifts JOIN Events ON Shifts.event_id = Events.event_id JOIN ShiftAssignments ON Shifts.shift_id = ShiftAssignments.shift_id JOIN Volunteers ON ShiftAssignments.volunteer_id = Volunteers.volunteer_id WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_start_time ASC LIMIT 10;
